name: nhl_score_board
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool nhl_api.
Tool description: This API provides instant access to the latest data for all operations and players in the NHL. It features scores, odds, bookmakers' stats, standings, and historical data.
API description: This API endpoint will get the NHL scoreboard data for a specified date if available.

day.description: The day of the desired scoreboard data.

year.description: The year of the desired scoreboard data.

month.description: The month of the desired scoreboard data.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return. Defaults to '5'.
